Package com.treasure.hunt.game

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
com.treasure.hunt.game.GameManager
public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
The GameManager stores every Move-objects, happened in the game, the binds the views to update them for every move and runs the GameEngine step for step.
